articles.title: Roy Horn, legendary magician of duo Siegfried & Roy, dies from COVID-19 complications - CBS News
articles.description: Horn's partner in magic, Siegfried Fischbacher, said in a statement that, "the world has lost one of the greats of magic, but I have lost my best friend."
articles.content: Legendary illusionist Roy Uwe Ludwig Horn died in Las Vegas on Friday from complications related to COVID-19, CBS News confirmed in a statement from his press team. Horn, who was 75, was best known for his part in the magic duo Siegfried and Roy, which became… [+3215 chars]
